column5: I guess this is one way to catch a fish...strange but effective in this case~! lol  http://www.whoneedstelevision.com/?video_id=15386&pg=1
Different, but it seems to work. Good thing she had a boat.
Now why am I spending all this money on fishing equipment ?
I am not sure that jug fishing should be thought of as strange. It is actually a popular way to catch fish down here in the states.   Art
I think I'll stick to a rod and real myself...call me crazy~! lol
Gives a new meaning to the term "Jug" fishin'!!!
I'll bet she had one of those infamous "sabiki' rigs on them bottles.
Cool video. Some people have very different methods when it comes to fishing!
I have seen them do it here for catfish, LOL bigger jug though, usually like a 1 gallon white bleach bottle.
I hope that was their first date... if so that boy better marry her!!!
Nice gar! I hope they let it go with out hurting it. I was told that few people will kill or damage some gars so that they will die, in the Usa.
Interesting for sure! I would love to catch a gar that big! I would try rod and reel and that method, why not?  Easton

When I was young in the swamps  it was what you did to gars.The Alligator gars get really big and eat all of the game fish.As soon as you saw a gar the fish stopped biting and that was it.Any gar that was caught was killed.Dont know how they do it now. Joe
Looks to me like just a variation on float fishing.
